topic.title: Adding Oxygen Feedback to Your Website

Adding comment system to WebHelp output

body.p:
The Oxygen Feedback comment system can be added at the bottom of each topic in your WebHelp Responsive documentation or added to any website. There are three general options for adding Oxygen Feedback to your output:
Add the Oxygen Feedback component in WebHelp output generated from Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
Add the Oxygen Feedback component in WebHelp output generated from a command line.
Add the Oxygen Feedback component on any HTML-based website.
